Interface PermissionsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionsServiceImpl

    public interface PermissionsService
    Author:
    vdasilva

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OtherPermissions getOtherPermissions(String selectedUnitId) 
      OwnerPermissions getOwner(String selectedUnitId)
      Returns a List of all possible Owners of an unit.
      List<GroupPermissions> getUnitPermissions(String selectedUnitId)
      Returns a list of all group permissions, no matter if the group currently have any rights.

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        OwnerPermissions getOwner(String selectedUnitId)
                   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                          InterruptedException
        Returns a List of all possible Owners of an unit. The current owner is marked with OwnerPermissions.currentOwner.
        Parameters:
        selectedUnitId - the unit to get all possible owners
        Returns:
        List of all possible Owners
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException

      • getUnitPermissions

        List<GroupPermissions> getUnitPermissions(String selectedUnitId)
                                   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Returns a list of all group permissions, no matter if the group currently have any rights.
        Parameters:
        selectedUnitId - the unit to get all Group-permissions
        Returns:
        List of all group permissions
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException

      • save

        void save(String selectedUnitId,
          List<GroupPermissions> permissions,
          OwnerPermissions owner,
          OtherPermissions other)
   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
          InterruptedException,
          ExecutionException
        Saves the new Settings for the unit.

        Permissions for Group and the Owner and his permissions are set.

        Parameters:
        selectedUnitId - the unit to save permissions for
        permissions - the group-permissions to save
        owner - the new Owner (or OwnerPermissions.currentOwner if none
        other -
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
